name: Armored Defense
description: When you wear armor, you add your armor bonus to your Reflex Defense.

name: Improved Armored Defense
description: When you wear armor, you add your armor bonus to your Fortitude Defense.

name: Juggernaut
description: You can move at normal speed while wearing heavy armor.

name: Second Skin
description: You reduce the armor check penalty of any armor you wear by 2 (minimum 0).

name: Armor Mastery
description: You gain Damage Reduction 2 while wearing armor.

name: Brute Force
description: When you successfully hit a target with a melee attack, you may spend a swift action to push the target 1 square.

name: Close Combat Shot
description: You do not provoke attacks of opportunity when making ranged attacks against adjacent targets.

name: Point Blank Shot
description: You gain a +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls with ranged weapons against targets within 6 squares.

name: Rapid Shot
description: When making a full attack with a ranged weapon, you may make one additional attack, but all attacks take a -2 penalty.

name: Deadeye
description: You ignore cover bonuses to Reflex Defense when making ranged attacks against targets within 6 squares.

name: Assured Attack
description: You may reroll one attack roll per round made with an unarmed strike or melee weapon. You must keep the result of the reroll, even if it is worse.

name: Crushing Blow
description: Once per round, when you successfully hit a target with a melee attack, you may move the target -1 step down the condition track.

name: Knockdown
description: Once per round, when you successfully hit a target with a melee attack, you may attempt to knock the target prone as a free action.

name: Melee Smash
description: You gain a +2 bonus on melee damage rolls.

name: Powerful Charge
description: When you charge, you gain a +5 bonus on melee damage rolls instead of +2.

name: Ambush
description: If you act during a surprise round, you deal +1 die of damage with your first attack.

name: Stealthy Kill
description: If you reduce a target to 0 hit points during a surprise round, you may make a Stealth check to avoid detection as a free action.

name: Silent Takedown
description: You may make a melee attack against a flat-footed target. If successful, the target cannot speak or make noise until the beginning of your next turn.

name: Precision Strike
description: You gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls made against flat-footed targets.

name: Improved Stealth
description: You may reroll Stealth checks and take the better result.

name: Grenade Expert
description: You gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls made with grenades.

name: Improved Grenade Range
description: You increase the range increment of grenades by 2 squares.

name: Grenade Barrage
description: When making a full attack, you may throw two grenades instead of one. Each attack takes a -2 penalty.

name: Pinpoint Explosion
description: You may choose to exclude one square from the area of effect of a grenade you throw.

name: Demolitionist
description: You gain a +5 bonus on Mechanics checks made to place or disarm explosives.

name: Defend Ally
description: As a reaction, you may impose a -2 penalty on an attack roll made against an adjacent ally.

name: Interpose
description: As a reaction, you may move up to your speed to place yourself between an attacker and an adjacent ally, becoming the new target of the attack.

name: Sacrificial Dodge
description: When using Interpose, you gain a +2 bonus to Reflex Defense against the redirected attack.

name: Bodyguard
description: You may designate one adjacent ally as your protected charge. That ally gains a +1 bonus to Reflex Defense while adjacent to you.

name: Improved Bodyguard
description: Your protected charge gains a +2 bonus to Reflex Defense while adjacent to you.

name: Shield Wall
description: While adjacent to another ally with a shield, you both gain a +2 bonus to Reflex Defense.

name: Hold the Line
description: Enemies provoke attacks of opportunity from you when they move out of a square adjacent to you, even if they use the Withdraw action.

name: Last Stand
description: Once per encounter, when you are reduced to 0 hit points, you may remain conscious and active for 1 additional round.

name: Tactical Aid
description: As a standard action, you may grant an adjacent ally a +2 bonus on their next attack roll or skill check.

name: Improved Tactical Aid
description: Your Tactical Aid bonus increases to +4.

name: Weapon Focus
description: Choose one type of weapon. You gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls with that weapon type.

name: Greater Weapon Focus
description: Your bonus on attack rolls with your chosen weapon type increases to +2.

name: Weapon Specialization
description: You gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls with your chosen weapon type.

name: Greater Weapon Specialization
description: Your bonus on damage rolls with your chosen weapon type increases to +4.

name: Devastating Attack
description: Your chosen weapon type ignores Damage Reduction equal to your base attack bonus.

name: Penetrating Attack
description: Your chosen weapon type ignores up to 10 points of Damage Reduction.

name: Multifocus
description: You may choose a second weapon type to benefit from Weapon Focus and Weapon Specialization.

name: Versatile Specialization
description: You may switch your chosen weapon types once per day after 10 minutes of practice.

name: Weapon Mastery
description: You gain an additional +2 bonus to damage rolls with your chosen weapon type (total +6).

name: Critical Precision
description: You gain a +5 bonus on rolls to confirm critical hits with your chosen weapon type.

name: Force Slam
description: You may use the Force Slam power as a standard action. Targets hit by the power are knocked prone.

name: Improved Force Slam
description: Targets hit by your Force Slam power move -1 step down the condition track.

name: Force Stun
description: You may use the Force Stun power to move a target -1 step down the condition track.

name: Improved Force Stun
description: Your Force Stun power moves the target -2 steps down the condition track instead of -1.

name: Force Thrust
description: You may use the Force Thrust power to push a target 1 square per point of your Use the Force check result over the target’s Fortitude Defense.

name: Improved Force Thrust
description: Your Force Thrust power pushes the target an additional number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

name: Force Disarm
description: You may use the Force Disarm power to remove a weapon or item from a target’s grasp.

name: Improved Force Disarm
description: You gain a +5 bonus on Use the Force checks made to disarm a target.

name: Force Grip
description: You may use the Force Grip power to deal damage and immobilize a target.

name: Improved Force Grip
description: Your Force Grip power moves the target -1 step down the condition track if they fail their Fortitude save.

name: Force Push
description: You may use the Force Push power to knock targets back and potentially prone.

name: Improved Force Push
description: Targets hit by your Force Push power move -1 step down the condition track if they fail their Fortitude save.

name: Force Blast
description: You may use the Force Blast power to deal area damage to multiple targets within a cone.

name: Improved Force Blast
description: Your Force Blast power deals an additional die of damage.

name: Master Alter
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Use the Force checks when using Alter powers.

name: Force Recovery
description: You may use the Force to recover hit points equal to your level as a standard action once per encounter.

name: Improved Force Recovery
description: You may use Force Recovery twice per encounter instead of once.

name: Force Shield
description: You may use the Force Shield power to gain a +5 bonus to Reflex Defense until the start of your next turn.

name: Improved Force Shield
description: Your Force Shield bonus increases to +10.

name: Force Protection
description: You gain Damage Reduction 5 against Force powers until the start of your next turn when using the Force Protection power.

name: Improved Force Protection
description: Your Damage Reduction against Force powers increases to 10.

name: Force Vitality
description: You may use the Force Vitality power to gain temporary hit points equal to your level.

name: Improved Force Vitality
description: Your temporary hit points from Force Vitality increase by your Charisma modifier.

name: Force Purity
description: You may use the Force Purity power to remove one persistent condition affecting you.

name: Master Control
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Use the Force checks when using Control powers.

name: Force Perception
description: You may use the Force to detect hidden enemies, objects, or disturbances in the Force. Gain a +5 bonus on Perception checks when using the Force.

name: Improved Force Perception
description: You may reroll Perception checks made using the Force and take the better result.

name: Force Awareness
description: You may use the Force Awareness power to gain a +2 bonus on Initiative checks and Reflex Defense for 1 minute.

name: Improved Force Awareness
description: Your bonus from Force Awareness increases to +4.

name: Force Empathy
description: You may use the Force Empathy power to sense the emotional state of a target within 12 squares.

name: Force Persuasion
description: You may use the Use the Force skill in place of Persuasion to influence others.

name: Force Treatment
description: You may use the Use the Force skill in place of Treat Injury to heal others.

name: Jedi Healer
description: When you use Force Treatment, the target regains additional hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.

name: Jedi Trance
description: You may enter a trance to regain hit points as if resting, even while active.

name: Telekinetic Savant
prerequisite: Force Power: Force Slam or Move Object
description: You may spend a Force Point to reroll a Use the Force check when using telekinetic powers.

name: Block
description: You may negate a melee attack using a Use the Force check as a reaction.

name: Deflect
description: You may negate a ranged attack using a Use the Force check as a reaction.

name: Lightsaber Defense
description: When wielding a lightsaber, you gain a +1 bonus to Reflex Defense.

name: Riposte
description: When you successfully Block a melee attack, you may make an immediate attack against that opponent.

name: Saber Swarm
description: You may spend a Force Point to make an additional attack with a lightsaber during your turn.

name: Weapon Focus (Lightsabers)
description: You gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls with lightsabers.

name: Force Intuition
description: You may use Use the Force instead of Initiative checks.

name: Force Technique
description: You gain access to a Force Technique of your choice.

name: Force Vision
description: You may spend a Force Point to gain insight into a person, place, or object.

name: Force Flow
description: You may spend a Force Point to regain a spent Force Power once per encounter.

name: Force Harmony
description: You may spend a Force Point to allow allies within 6 squares to regain a spent Force Power.

name: Force Haze
description: You may spend a Force Point to obscure yourself and allies from detection for 1 minute.

name: Force Channel
description: You may spend a Force Point to increase the potency of a Force Power.

name: Force Clarity
description: You may spend a Force Point to reroll a Use the Force check and take the better result.

name: Force Meditation
description: You may enter a meditative state to regain Force Powers more quickly.

name: Force Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Force Power without expending it.

name: Dark Presence
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Persuasion checks made to intimidate and on Initiative checks.

name: Dark Side Adept
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Use the Force checks to activate Dark Side powers.

name: Dark Side Savant
description: You may spend a Force Point to regain a spent Dark Side Force Power once per encounter.

name: Force Deception
description: You may use Use the Force instead of Deception checks.

name: Force Dominate
description: You may spend a Force Point to reroll a Use the Force check when using mind-affecting powers.

name: Force Terror
description: You may spend a Force Point to move a target -1 step down the condition track when using a fear-based power.

name: Sith Alchemy
description: You may use Use the Force to create Sith artifacts or enhance weapons with Dark Side energy.

name: Sith Sorcery
description: You may spend a Force Point to cast a Sith ritual or enhance a Dark Side power.

name: Sith Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Dark Side power without expending it.

name: Corruption
description: You may spend a Force Point to corrupt a target, giving them a Dark Side Point if they fail a Will defense check.

name: Force Pilot
description: You may use Use the Force instead of Pilot checks.

name: Force Talisman
description: You may create a talisman that grants a +2 bonus to a skill or defense while worn.

name: Force Weapon
description: You may imbue a melee weapon with the Force, allowing it to bypass damage reduction and resistances.

name: Force Technique Mastery
description: You gain access to an additional Force Technique and may use one Technique twice per encounter.

name: Jedi Knight Defense
description: You gain a +1 bonus to Reflex Defense while wielding a lightsaber.

name: Jedi Knight Speed
description: You may spend a Force Point to gain a +2 square bonus to your speed for 1 minute.

name: Jedi Knight Tactics
description: You may spend a Force Point to grant allies within 6 squares a +1 bonus to attack rolls for 1 round.

name: Jedi Knight Valor
description: You may spend a Force Point to grant yourself and allies within 6 squares temporary hit points equal to your level.

name: Jedi Knight Weapon Mastery
description: You gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls with lightsabers.

name: Jedi Knight Resolve
description: You may spend a Force Point to reroll a failed saving throw and take the better result.

name: Jedi Sentinel Awareness
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Perception checks and Initiative checks.

name: Jedi Sentinel Insight
description: You may reroll a Perception check and take the better result once per encounter.

name: Jedi Sentinel Resolve
description: You may spend a Force Point to reroll a failed Will defense check and take the better result.

name: Jedi Sentinel Stealth
description: You may use Use the Force instead of Stealth checks.

name: Jedi Sentinel Tactics
description: You may spend a Force Point to grant allies within 6 squares a +1 bonus to Reflex Defense for 1 round.

name: Jensaarai Defender
description: You gain a +2 bonus to Fortitude Defense while wearing armor.

name: Jensaarai Shield
description: You may spend a Force Point to gain Damage Reduction 5 for 1 minute.

name: Jensaarai Cloak
description: You may spend a Force Point to gain concealment for 1 minute.

name: Jensaarai Strike
description: You gain a +2 bonus on melee damage rolls while wearing armor.

name: Jensaarai Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Jensaarai talent without expending it.

name: Baran Do Insight
description: You may reroll a Use the Force check made to sense Force disturbances or foresee events.

name: Baran Do Cloak
description: You may spend a Force Point to gain concealment for 1 minute.

name: Baran Do Shield
description: You may spend a Force Point to gain a +5 bonus to Will Defense for 1 minute.

name: Baran Do Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Baran Do talent without expending it.

name: Shaper Adept
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Use the Force checks to manipulate living tissue.

name: Shaper Technique
description: You may spend a Force Point to enhance a Shaper power or reroll a Use the Force check.

name: Shaper Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Shaper talent without expending it.

name: Zeison Sha Throw
description: You gain a +2 bonus on ranged attack rolls made with thrown weapons.

name: Zeison Sha Defense
description: You gain a +2 bonus to Fortitude Defense while wearing armor.

name: Zeison Sha Technique
description: You may spend a Force Point to reroll a Use the Force check made to enhance a thrown weapon attack.

name: Zeison Sha Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Zeison Sha talent without expending it.

name: Aing-Tii Flow-Walking
description: You may spend a Force Point to perceive events in the past or future as if they were happening now.

name: Aing-Tii Teleport
description: You may spend a Force Point to teleport yourself up to 12 squares as a swift action.

name: Aing-Tii Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use an Aing-Tii talent without expending it.

name: Fallanassi Illusion
description: You may spend a Force Point to create a convincing illusion that affects all senses.

name: Fallanassi Concealment
description: You may spend a Force Point to hide yourself and allies from Force detection for 1 minute.

name: Fallanassi Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Fallanassi talent without expending it.

name: Matukai Strength
description: You gain a +2 bonus to melee damage rolls and Strength-based skill checks.

name: Matukai Conditioning
description: You gain a +2 bonus to Fortitude Defense and Endurance checks.

name: Matukai Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Matukai talent without expending it.

name: Order of the Terrible Glare
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Intimidate checks and Use the Force checks made to instill fear.

name: Terrible Glare Technique
description: You may spend a Force Point to move a target -1 step down the condition track when using a fear-based Force power.

name: Terrible Glare Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Terrible Glare talent without expending it.

name: Witches of Dathomir Spellcasting
description: You may use Use the Force to cast spells from the Dathomir tradition.

name: Dathomir Spell Focus
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Use the Force checks made to activate Dathomir spells.

name: Dathomir Spell Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Dathomir talent without expending it.

name: Saber Rake
description: When wielding a lightsaber, you may spend a Force Point to make an additional attack as a swift action.

name: Duelist Precision
description: You gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls made with lightsabers against a single target you designate.

name: Duelist Defense
description: You gain a +2 bonus to Reflex Defense against attacks from your designated target.

name: Duelist Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Duelist talent without expending it.

name: Juyo Mastery
description: You gain a +2 bonus on melee damage rolls when using the Juyo lightsaber form.

name: Makashi Technique
description: You gain a +2 bonus to Reflex Defense against melee attacks while wielding a lightsaber.

name: Makashi Riposte
description: When you successfully Block a melee attack, you may make an immediate attack against that opponent with a +2 bonus.

name: Makashi Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Makashi talent without expending it.

name: Shii-Cho Technique
description: You gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls against multiple opponents while wielding a lightsaber.

name: Shii-Cho Defense
description: You gain a +2 bonus to Reflex Defense against attacks from multiple opponents.

name: Shii-Cho Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Shii-Cho talent without expending it.

name: Soresu Technique
description: You gain a +2 bonus to Reflex Defense while wielding a lightsaber and using the Soresu form.

name: Soresu Reflection
description: You may reflect blaster bolts back at the attacker with a successful Deflect check.

name: Soresu Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Soresu talent without expending it.

name: Ataru Technique
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Acrobatics checks and Reflex Defense while moving at least 2 squares during your turn.

name: Ataru Strike
description: You may spend a Force Point to make an additional attack after moving at least 2 squares.

name: Ataru Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use an Ataru talent without expending it.

name: Shien Technique
description: You gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls made with lightsabers against opponents using ranged weapons.

name: Djem So Technique
description: You gain a +2 bonus on melee damage rolls made with lightsabers against opponents using melee weapons.

name: Shien/Djem So Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Shien or Djem So talent without expending it.

name: Niman Technique
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Use the Force checks while wielding a lightsaber.

name: Niman Balance
description: You may spend a Force Point to reroll a Use the Force check and take the better result.

name: Niman Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Niman talent without expending it.

name: Vaapad Technique
description: You gain a +2 bonus on melee attack rolls against targets with a Dark Side Score.

name: Vaapad Strike
description: You may spend a Force Point to make an additional attack against a target with a Dark Side Score.

name: Vaapad Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Vaapad talent without expending it.

name: Jar'Kai Technique
description: When wielding two lightsabers, you gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls made with your off-hand weapon.

name: Jar'Kai Defense
description: When wielding two lightsabers, you gain a +2 bonus to Reflex Defense.

name: Jar'Kai Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Jar'Kai talent without expending it.

name: Tràkata Technique
description: You may deactivate and reactivate your lightsaber as a swift action to gain a +2 bonus on Stealth checks and feint attempts.

name: Tràkata Feint
description: You may spend a Force Point to feint as a swift action and gain a +2 bonus on the attack roll that follows.

name: Tràkata Mastery
description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Tràkata talent without expending it.

name: Cover Fire
description: When you use the aid another action to improve an ally's attack roll, the ally also gains a +2 bonus to Reflex Defense until the beginning of your next turn.

name: Improved Cover Fire
description: The bonus to Reflex Defense granted by Cover Fire increases to +5.

name: Suppressing Fire
description: You may use autofire to suppress an area, forcing enemies to make a Will defense check or become flat-footed until the end of your next turn.

name: Tactical Aid
description: You may use the aid another action to grant an ally a +2 bonus to any one skill check made during their next turn.

name: Hunter's Mark
description: You designate a single target as your mark, gaining a +2 bonus on attack rolls and skill checks against that target.

name: Relentless Pursuit
description: You may ignore difficult terrain and gain a +2 bonus to speed when moving toward your mark.

name: Capture Specialist
description: You gain a +2 bonus on grapple checks and may use ranged weapons to make stun attacks more effectively.

name: Interrogator
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Persuasion checks made to intimidate and may reroll failed checks once per encounter.

name: Commanding Presence
description: Allies within 6 squares gain a +1 morale bonus to attack rolls and skill checks while you are conscious.

name: Tactical Precision
description: You may spend a swift action to grant one ally within line of sight a +2 bonus to their next attack roll or skill check.

name: Battle Analysis
description: You may spend a full-round action to analyze the battlefield, granting all allies within line of sight a +2 bonus to attack rolls and skill checks for 1 round.

name: Coordinated Attack
description: When you and an ally both attack the same target in the same round, you each gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against that target.

name: Crime Lord Influence
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Persuasion checks made to intimidate or negotiate with criminal elements.

name: Crime Lord Connections
description: You may reroll a Gather Information or Persuasion check once per encounter when dealing with criminal contacts.

name: Crime Lord Strategy
description: You may spend a swift action to grant an ally a +2 bonus to Stealth or Deception checks for 1 round.

name: Crime Lord Mastermind
description: You may spend a Force Point to allow an ally to reroll a failed skill check and take the better result.

name: Political Savvy
description: You gain a +2 bonus on Persuasion checks made to negotiate or influence political figures.

name: Diplomatic Immunity
description: You may spend a Force Point to avoid legal consequences or gain safe passage in hostile territory.

prerequisite.name: Technical Expertise
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus on Mechanics checks and may reroll a failed Mechanics check once per encounter.

prerequisite.name: System Optimization
prerequisite.description: You may spend a swift action to grant a vehicle or droid a +2 bonus to one defense or skill check for 1 round.

prerequisite.name: Hardware Specialist
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus on Mechanics checks made to modify or repair equipment, vehicles, or droids.

prerequisite.name: Software Specialist
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus on Use Computer checks and may reroll a failed Use Computer check once per encounter.

prerequisite.name: Corporate Connections
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus on Gather Information and Persuasion checks involving corporate entities.

prerequisite.name: Corporate Strategy
prerequisite.description: You may spend a swift action to grant an ally a +2 bonus to a skill check related to business, finance, or negotiation.

prerequisite.name: Corporate Sabotage
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus on Deception and Stealth checks made to infiltrate or sabotage corporate targets.

prerequisite.name: Corporate Mastermind
prerequisite.description: You may spend a Force Point to allow an ally to reroll a failed skill check related to corporate intrigue.

prerequisite.name: Industrial Expertise
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus on Knowledge (Technology) and Mechanics checks involving corporate equipment or facilities.

prerequisite.name: Corporate Immunity
prerequisite.description: You may spend a Force Point to avoid legal consequences or gain protection from corporate retaliation.

prerequisite.name: Field Commander Tactics
prerequisite.description: You may spend a swift action to grant all allies within line of sight a +1 bonus to attack rolls for 1 round.

prerequisite.name: Field Commander Precision
prerequisite.description: You may designate one ally within line of sight to gain a +2 bonus to their next attack roll or skill check.

prerequisite.name: Field Commander Resolve
prerequisite.description: You may spend a Force Point to reroll a failed saving throw and take the better result.

prerequisite.name: Infiltrator Stealth
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus on Stealth checks and may reroll a failed Stealth check once per encounter.

prerequisite.name: Infiltrator Deception
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus on Deception checks and may feint as a swift action once per encounter.

prerequisite.name: Infiltrator Sabotage
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus on Mechanics checks made to disable devices or sabotage systems.

prerequisite.name: Ace Pilot Maneuver
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus on Pilot checks made to perform stunts or evasive maneuvers.

prerequisite.name: Ace Pilot Evasion
prerequisite.description: You may spend a Force Point to negate damage from an area attack while piloting a vehicle.

prerequisite.name: Ace Pilot Precision
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls made with vehicle weapons.

prerequisite.name: Ace Pilot Mastery
prerequisite.description: You may spend a Force Point to use an Ace Pilot talent without expending it.

prerequisite.name: Vehicle Commander
prerequisite.description: While commanding a vehicle, allies aboard gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and skill checks.

prerequisite.name: Vehicle Coordination
prerequisite.description: You may spend a swift action to grant one ally aboard a +2 bonus to their next attack roll or skill check.

prerequisite.name: Vehicle Evasion
prerequisite.description: You may spend a Force Point to negate damage from an area attack while aboard a vehicle.

prerequisite.name: Droid Commander
prerequisite.description: Allied droids within 6 squares gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and skill checks while you are conscious.

prerequisite.name: Droid Coordination
prerequisite.description: You may spend a swift action to grant one allied droid a +2 bonus to its next attack roll or skill check.

prerequisite.name: Droid Evasion
prerequisite.description: You may spend a Force Point to negate damage from an area attack targeting an allied droid within 6 squares.

prerequisite.name: Support Specialist Aid
prerequisite.description: You may use the aid another action as a swift action once per round.

prerequisite.name: Support Specialist Boost
prerequisite.description: When you use aid another, the bonus granted increases to +3.

prerequisite.name: Support Specialist Rally
prerequisite.description: You may spend a swift action to allow one ally within 6 squares to reroll a failed saving throw.

prerequisite.name: Support Specialist Mastery
prerequisite.description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Support Specialist talent without expending it.

prerequisite.name: Beast Handler
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus on Handle Animal checks and may reroll a failed check once per encounter.

prerequisite.name: Pack Tactics
prerequisite.description: When you and your beast ally attack the same target, you each gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls.

prerequisite.name: Beast Empathy
prerequisite.description: You may use Persuasion instead of Handle Animal to influence beasts and wild creatures.

prerequisite.name: Beast Mastery
prerequisite.description: You may spend a Force Point to allow your beast ally to reroll a failed attack or skill check.

prerequisite.name: Survivalist
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus on Survival checks and may reroll a failed check once per encounter.

prerequisite.name: Fringe Tactics
prerequisite.description: You may spend a swift action to grant an ally a +2 bonus to Stealth or Survival checks for 1 round.

prerequisite.name: Fringe Adaptability
prerequisite.description: You may reroll a failed skill check once per encounter when operating in unfamiliar terrain or culture.

prerequisite.name: Fringe Mastery
prerequisite.description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Fringe Specialist talent without expending it.

prerequisite.name: Exotic Weapon Specialist
prerequisite.description: You gain proficiency with one exotic weapon and a +1 bonus on attack rolls with it.

prerequisite.name: Weapon Versatility
prerequisite.description: You may treat any weapon as if it were a different weapon of the same category for the purpose of feats and talents.

prerequisite.name: Weapon Mastery
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls made with exotic weapons you are proficient with.

prerequisite.name: Improvised Weapon Master
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls made with improvised weapons and may treat them as simple weapons for feat purposes.

prerequisite.name: Fringe Operative
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus on Deception and Stealth checks while operating outside structured authority.

prerequisite.name: Fringe Mobility
prerequisite.description: You ignore difficult terrain and gain a +2 bonus to speed while evading pursuit or navigating urban environments.

prerequisite.name: Fringe Escape
prerequisite.description: You may reroll a failed Acrobatics or Stealth check once per encounter when escaping confinement or surveillance.

prerequisite.name: Fringe Mastery
prerequisite.description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Fringe Specialist talent without expending it.

prerequisite.name: Underworld Tactics
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus on Initiative checks and may reroll a failed Deception or Stealth check once per encounter.

prerequisite.name: Black Market Access
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus on Gather Information and Persuasion checks related to illegal goods or services.

prerequisite.name: Crime Syndicate Coordination
prerequisite.description: You may spend a swift action to grant an ally a +2 bonus to a skill check involving criminal activity.

prerequisite.name: Crime Lord Mastery
prerequisite.description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Crime Lord talent without expending it.

prerequisite.name: Underworld Coordination
prerequisite.description: You may spend a swift action to allow an ally to reroll a failed skill check involving criminal activity.

prerequisite.name: Fringe Resilience
prerequisite.description: You gain a +2 bonus to Fortitude Defense and may reroll a failed Endurance check once per encounter.

prerequisite.name: Fringe Improvisation
prerequisite.description: You may treat improvised tools and weapons as standard gear for the purpose of skill checks and attack rolls.

prerequisite.name: Fringe Tactics (Scoundrel)
prerequisite.description: You may spend a swift action to grant an ally a +2 bonus to Deception or Stealth checks for 1 round.

prerequisite.name: Fringe Mastery (Scoundrel)
prerequisite.description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Fringe Specialist talent without expending it.

prerequisite.name: Black Market Mastery
prerequisite.description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Crime Lord talent without expending it.

prerequisite.name: Improvised Escape
prerequisite.description: You may spend a Force Point to reroll a failed Acrobatics or Stealth check made to escape confinement or surveillance.

prerequisite.name: Beast Bond
prerequisite.description: You may spend a Force Point to allow your beast ally to reroll a failed saving throw or skill check.

prerequisite.name: Beast Mastery II
prerequisite.description: You may spend a Force Point to use a Beast Master talent without expending it.

prerequisite.name: Final Gambit
prerequisite.description: Once per day, you may spend a Force Point to automatically succeed on a single skill check or saving throw.
